title: The Unemployed Demon Lord - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Beautiful Female Lead   Demons   Dragons   Elves   Fantasy World   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Narcissistic Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Shameless Protagonist   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: 业舞
description: He is the Demon Lord, who has become unemployed because the Council fired him. She is the Hero, who was laid off because of the failure of a crusade. The bond of destiny binds the two together as they embark on an journey full of unknown adventures.>
